metadata.dc:author: Salvador Vilalta, X
Carol Murillo, J
Arnau Figuerras, J
metadata.dc:description: The aim of the study was to ascertain the magnitude, causes and frequency of fatal accidents in Spain in children aged O to 14 years. The information was provided by the Instituto Nacional de Estadística. The latest data published for the five years 1982 to 1986 inclusive are studied and the causes of death by accident evaluated.
metadata.dc:title: Mortalidad por accidentes en pediatría. Causas y frecuencia.
[Mortality due to accidents in pediatrics. Their causes and frequency].
